original_text: for you will be a witness for him to everyone of what you have seen and heard.
korean_text: 네가 그를 위하여 모든 사람 앞에서 네가 보고 들은 것에 증인이 되리라

sentences.original_text: for you will be a witness for him to everyone
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 모든 사람에게 그의 증인이 될 것이라

sentences.original_text: of what you have seen and heard
